diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $KL$ is $4x$.

The length of the line $JL$ is $5x - 6$.
The length of the line $KJ$ is equal to the length of the line $KL$.
The length of the line $KJ$ is equal to the length of the line $JL$.
line_instances: The lines $KJ$ and $KL$ form a segment.
